scripts.build:packages: npm run clean:packages && lerna changed | while read package; do npx rollup -c --scope $package || exit 1; done
scripts.build:allpackages: npm run clean:packages && for dir in packages/*; do package=${dir#'packages/'}; rollup -c --scope @prpl/$package || exit 1; done
scripts.reset: npm run clean:packages && rm -rf ./**/.cache && rm -rf ./**/node_modules && rm -rf ./package.lock && npm install
